items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right amount of sparkle.
items.body: Great dress. Received many compliments. True to size. Comfortable cocktail dress. Read more
items.author: Veronica Cedillo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Black cocktail dress
items.body: It’s a pretty dress, the picture doesn’t show how the bodice fits, it drapes across the front and has more of a cowl neckline. I thought it was put together crooked but I guess it’s supposed to be on an angle. I like the stretch of the fabric, the length is nice over the knee. I’m 5’7” 145lbs and wear a med I will have to wear something underneath to fit smoothly Read more
items.author: Cheryl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, snug
items.body: Fits perfectly, snug. Wore it for our church’s 160th anniversary. I relieved a lot of compliments. It was very comfortable. If you have long hair it will stick to the sequences. Read more
items.author: Silly Lilly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for people with larger tummies
items.body: If you carry your weight in your midsection this dress is NOT for you. It has a nice amount of stretch but the way it is hemmed makes it feel a bit cheap. The color is nice and bright. Read more
items.author: D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect party dress!
items.body: This is a beautiful dress for the price. I was amazed that it is fully lined! It is a gift for my daughter, for the holidays. She will be expected to attend a few parties and was not able to afford a dress. This is so pretty that she will be able to wear it without embarrassment. It arrived quickly and in excellent condition. Read more
items.author: Maplelaf

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: I’m 5’0 and 139 lbs and this dress fit really well. It hit me right at mid-calf, which was perfect. I wasn’t expecting the extra layer on the top part of the dress, but it actually looked fine once I tried it on. The material has a little stretch to it, which made it really comfortable to wear. Overall really happy with it! Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars How it fits
items.body: Looks better on than in the pi Read more
items.author: Shelle Pete

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Navy, Pink, Purple, Burgundy, Black, Champagne. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
